name: Snow Warrior
description:
The town where you live is now full of evil snowman. They killed everyone in town and you are the only one left alive.

Luckily they can be destroyed by throwing snowballs at them. Get out of the town before they kill you!

Run, shoot and don't stop!


Control

WASD or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

Left Click to shoot

Pick up items to heal or reload

Main Menu Music by Tom Peter
